import sys
from operator import mul

def permutaciones(n,k):
    if k > n-k:
        k = n-k
    return int(reduce(mul, range((n-k+1), n+1), 1) /
      reduce(mul, range(1,k+1), 1))

def catalan(n):
    if n == 0:
        return 0
    if n == 1 or n == 2:
        return 1
    if n > 2:
        return permutaciones(2*n,n)/(n+1)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    t = int(raw_input())
    for x in sys.stdin:
        print catalan(int(x)-1) % 10000
